mapper.select: select record_id, section_id, s_id, s_name, looks_remark, character_remark, ability_remark, other_remark, composite_score, time_used from record where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into record (record_id, section_id, s_id, s_name, looks_remark, character_remark, ability_remark, other_remark, composite_score, time_used) values (#{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{looksRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{characterRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abilityRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compositeScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeUsed,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
